entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
